content: Do you really want to delete selected room templates? They cannot be restored.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a confirmation message that appears when deleting room templates in a UI component. The text informs the user about the irreversibility of the action and is likely displayed as a dialog prompt or button caption. It should be translated to convey the same level of caution and importance in different languages.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'بعد الحذف' (ba'da al-hazf) is somewhat redundant. It literally means 'after deletion' which is implied by the action of deleting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: هل أنتم متأكدون من رغبتكم في حذف قوالب الغرف المحددة؟ لا يمكن استعادتها.
¿Realmente desea eliminar las plantillas de sala seleccionadas? No se podrán restaurar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'restaurar' is misspelled. It should be 'restaurar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ¿Realmente desea eliminar las plantillas de sala seleccionadas? No se podrán restaurar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, a more natural-sounding phrasing in Spanish would be to use 'usted' (formal you) or remove the 'desea' altogether.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ¿Realmente eliminar plantillas de sala seleccionadas? No se podrán restaurar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ແມ່ແບບ' (mae-baep) is correctly spelled, meaning 'template'.
The word 'ຫ້ອງ' (hong) is correctly spelled, meaning 'room'.
The word 'ທີ່ເລືອກໄວ້' (tee leuak wai) is correctly spelled, meaning 'selected'.
The word 'ຈິງໆບໍ' (jing jing bor) is correctly spelled, meaning 'really?'.
The word 'ມັນ' (man) is correctly spelled, meaning 'it'.
The word 'ບໍ່ສາມາດ' (bor samat) is correctly spelled, meaning 'cannot'.
The word 'ກູ້ຄືນໄດ້' (goo keun dai) is correctly spelled, meaning 'be restored'.

While grammatically correct, the translation could be more natural-sounding. 'ກູ້ຄືນໄດ້' is a literal translation of 'can be restored.' A more natural phrasing might involve 'ບໍ່ສາມາດກູ້ຄືນໄດ້' (bor samat goo keun dai - cannot be recovered), emphasizing the permanence of the deletion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການລົບແມ່ແບບຫ້ອງທີ່ເລືອກໄວ້ຈິງໆບໍ? ມັນບໍ່ສາມາດກູ້ຄືນໄດ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Recuperarea acestor șabloane este imposibilă" is a bit too formal and literal. A more natural Romanian phrasing would be something like 'Nu pot fi refăcute' or 'Nu se mai pot recupera'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Doriți să ștergeți șabloanele de săli selectate? Acestea nu pot fi refăcute.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "selected" is not accurate. 'සුදුසුකම් ලද' implies 'qualified' or 'eligible' rather than 'selected'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සුදුසු කාමර සැකිලි (Suduṣu kāmara säkiḷi) - meaning 'suitable room templates' or තෝරාගත් කාමර සැකිලි (Thōrāgath kāmara säkiḷi) - meaning 'selected room templates'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for a more natural flow in Sinhala. Specifically, the phrase 'එවා ප්‍රතිෂ්ඨාපනය කළ නොහැකි වනු ඇත' is slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: එවා නැවත පެއްවතීමට නොහැකි වනු ඇත (Evā nāwath pāpavethimata nokahī vanu atā) - meaning 'They cannot be recovered'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'соба' (soba) is a diminutive and slightly informal term for 'rooms'. A more formal and accurate term would be 'просторије' (prostorije) or 'собe' (sobe). While 'soba' isn't inherently wrong, 'prostorije' or 'sobe' better suits a confirmation dialog in a software interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Да ли заиста желите да обришете изабране шаблоне просторије/собе? Они се не могу вратити.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses 'vratiiti' which implies a return to a previous state. A more appropriate term would be 'ponovo koristiti' (to reuse) or simply implying they are permanently deleted, which is the meaning of the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da li zaista želite da obrišete izabrane šablone soba? Oni se ne mogu ponovo koristiti.
